text:
A tailor shop is not usually a place where one sees a woman showing off her midriff.
But cheeky Sofia Vergara gave suit-seeking customers more than they bargained for when she flashed her taut tummy as she left an outfitter in Beverly Hills on Tuesday.
The spicy Colombian seemed to revel in giving a teasing glimpse as she chatted on her phone while leaving the shop in the well-heeled area of Los Angeles County.
Flash lady: Sofia Vergara showed off her taut tummy as she left a tailors shop in Beverly Hills on Tuesday
The 44-year-old Latina lovely was looking in fine form for her ages in her skimpy white pullover, which gave a generous view of her taut torso, tight blue jeans and towering high heels.
Glamour model Sofia recently gave her fans a thrill by flaunting her physique yet again when she donned a skimpy swimsuit before straddling an inflatable bull in a swimming pool.
At first the Modern Family favourite looked like an experienced rider, but soon began to lose her balance before falling into the water completely.
The actress posted the thigh-slappingly hilarious video with the caption: 'I'm getting very good at #Ihaveallsummer.'

Sofia is gearing up for what be the most cerebral role in her career so far, in which she plays an icon of a flamenco dancer in the animated The Emoji Movie.
The comedy actress has opened up about the forthcoming role upcoming role, and her thought process on taking the part.
She said: 'I thought it was a great adventure and who doesn't like an emoji?
'I thought it was going to be a perfect role for me because people are always saying that I look like her!'
